content:
Per this page, I'd be interested in attending the next meeting, if only as a fly on the wall. I sent an email to till@bytecodealliance.org, but haven't heard back yet, and if I'm reading the schedule correctly the next meeting is in about 15 minutes. Any chance I could get the Zoom link?

wasmtime/meetings/wasmtime at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - wasmtime/meetings/wasmtime at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
apologies! Till is out for a bit, could you DM me your email and I'll try to add you to the invite?
Joel Dice has marked this topic as resolved.
